merge_clonal_groupings

Source: R/clonalutils.R
merge_clonal_groupings.Rd

Merge the multiple clonal groupings into a single grouping.

Usage

merge_clonal_groupings(data, groupings, sep = " // ")

Arguments

data

The product of scRepertoire::combineTCR, scRepertoire::combineTCR, or scRepertoire::combineExpression.

groupings

A list of the clonal groupings. Each element is a column in the data.

Value

The data with the combined groupings (.group)

Details

Because scRepertoire::clonalQuant and families don't support mutliple groupings, this is trying to merge the multiple groupings into a single grouping. And then later restore the original groupings.

On this page
